cosipy.cpkernel.grid.Node¶

class cosipy.cpkernel.grid.Node(height, snow_density, temperature, liquid_water_content, ice_fraction=None)¶

The Node-class stores the state variables of layer.

The numerical grid consists of a list of nodes that store the information of individual layers. The class provides various setter/getter functions to read or overwrite the state of individual layers.

Parameters

  • height (float) – Height of the layer [\(m\)]

  • density (float) – snow density [\(kg~m^{-3}\)]

  • temperature (float) – temperature of the layer [\(K\)]

  • liquid_water (float) – liquid water [\(m~w.e.\)]

Returns

Node

Return type

cosipy.cpkernel.node object

__init__(height, snow_density, temperature, liquid_water_content, ice_fraction=None)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Returnis the ice fraction of the node.

Returns the cold content of the node.

get_layer_density()

Returns the mean density including ice and liquid of the node.

get_layer_height()

Returns the layer height of the node.

get_layer_ice_fraction()

Returns the volumetric ice fraction of the node.

get_layer_irreducible_water_content()

Returns the irreducible water content of the node.

get_layer_liquid_water_content()

Returns the liquid water content of the node.

get_layer_porosity()

Returns the porosity of the node.

get_layer_refreeze()

Returns the amount of refreezing of the node.

get_layer_specific_heat()

Returns the volumetric averaged specific heat of the node.

get_layer_temperature()

Returns the snow layer temperature of the node.

get_layer_thermal_conductivity()

Returns the volumetric weighted thermal conductivity of the node.

get_layer_thermal_diffusivity()

Returns the thermal diffusivity of the node.

set_layer_height(height)

Sets the layer height of the node.

set_layer_ice_fraction(ifr)

Sets the ice fraction of the node.

set_layer_liquid_water_content(lwc)

Sets the liquid water content of the node.

set_layer_refreeze(refr)

Sets the amount of water refreezed of the node.

set_layer_temperature(T)

Sets the mean temperature of the node.
